name: code_context_extractor
description: Given one or more changed code hunks, return just enough surrounding context for solid review or impact analysis. For each hunk the tool: (1) grabs its enclosing function/method/class, (2) lists all imports in the file, (3) shows related global/static/member variables or enums, and (4) lists both callers and callees of that enclosing function. It prefers precise language-server indices, falling back to AST-based fuzzy search when needed. Output is plain text: a header with the file path followed by only the relevant line ranges (original numbers kept). Skip this tool for repo-wide scans that aren't tied to specific hunks.

files.description: Array of file objects with their changed line intervals

relativeFilePath.description: Relative path to the file containing changes

hunks.description: Array of line intervals representing changed code

startLine.description: Starting line number of the changed code (1-based indexing)

codebase_root.description: Absolute path of root directory of the codebase to search for related files (default: current directory).

output_schema.description: Formatted text containing a header filepath followed by only relevent code lines and line numbers
